name: Hot Clam Dip III
author: Teri
summary: This is a great clam dip for serving with crackers. My Aunt is famous in our family for the recipe! We all love it! Minced clams are mixed with a blend of mild seasonings and topped with Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 2 (6.5 ounce) cans minced clams, drained with juice reserved
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, slowly cook and stir minced clams in the lemon juice until heated and tender, abou 5 minutes
Transfer clams to a medium baking dish
Mix in seasoned bread crumbs, onion, parsley, oregano, black pepper, garlic powder, margarine and approximately 3/4 of the reserved clam juice
Top with grated Parmesan cheese and paprika
Bake clam mixture in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until lightly browned
